License, LLC |- |107.7||KBMX||Mix 108||Top 40(CHR)||Townsquare Media |- |} ==Television== Duluth has experienced firsthand the consequences of media consolidation. On March 8, 2005 the sale of Duluth's CBS affiliate was announced to Malara Broadcast Group of Sarasota, Florida. The group agreed to pay Granite Broadcasting Group, which already runs the NBC affiliate KBJR, to take over the operations for KDLH.
